Package it.polimi.ingsw.am42.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am42.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the player, containing all the attributes and methods to play his game
See Also:

    • checkRequirements

      public void checkRequirements(Face face) throws RequirementsNotMetException
      Checks if the card can be placed on the board, given its requirements and current board status
      Parameters:
      face - the face that we are checking if it can be inserted
      Throws:
      RequirementsNotMetException - if the requirements are not met

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(Position position, Face face)
      Places the face at the given position in the board IT MAKES THE HYPOTHESIS THAT THE POSITION IS CORRECT AND REQUIREMENTS ARE MET
      Parameters:
      position - the position to put the face in
      face - the face to insert inside the board

    • calculatePoint

      public int calculatePoint(Face face)
      Given a face, it returns the total points it would add if placed on the current board
      Parameters:
      face - the face that needs to be inserted
      Returns:
      the number of points the player could receive
